text: Pen God Kawnan ne ak abe, ne chɨnop binɨb kɨles ma mɨdobun okok kod mɨdɨl gɨñub. Chɨn God nop agnɨgun apun ak pen, takaw tay ak dɨl agɨnɨgun agɨl ma nopun. Anɨb ak chɨn koslam agep tek lup won ak, God Kawnan ne ke chɨnop nɨŋɨd, God nop kɨles gɨl agnɨgup. God Kawnan ne ak yɨgen bad tek agñub. Chɨn bɨ takaw apun ak mel, yɨgen bad tek agñub.
